description:
go.tools/go/types: don't modify lhs untyped types in constant shifts

Also: fix TestCheck (don't fail if there are no errors in -list mode)

Fixes issue 5895.

messages.text:
Hello adonovan@google.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

go.tools/go/types: don't modify lhs untyped types in constant shifts

Also: fix TestCheck (don't fail if there are no errors in -list mode)

Fixes issue 5895.

CC=golang-dev
